Course Quality Checklist

Checklist of minimum course requirements

A checklist of the minimum standards that a course must meet in order to be published on the Olbgis platform is provided below.

  • A minimum of 30 minutes of video content
  • At least five distinct lectures
  • Educational content that is useful
  • High definition video quality (720p or 1080p)
  • Audio that comes from both channels and is synced to video Audio that is of poor quality.
  • Audio quality that is not distracting to students
  • A distinct course landing page
  • A high quality course image standard .
  • A title and subtitle for the course that include relevant keywords
  • A course description that is more than 200 words long.
  • A finished target student section.
  • A complete instructor bio as well as a profile picture
